title: DarkAPI.io: HIBP & XposedOrNot Integration
description: Integrate Have I Been Pwned and XposedOrNot APIs into DarkAPI.io for credential exposure checking. Add new endpoints: /api/v1/exposure/email, /api/v1/exposure/password, /api/v1/exposure/domain, /api/v1/exposure/bulk. Feed data to threatdefense.ai and darkthreat.io
